paragraph.paragraph: Eiffel class file items represent Eiffel ../../../../../../../../technologies/dotnet/eiffel_dotnet_language/10_conventions/10_terminology.xmlclass source files (*.e) in an EiffelEnvision project. Eiffel class file items are represented in by two different icons. ../../../../../../images/icons/file_class_blue.ico for regular classes and ../../../../../../images/icons/file_class_winform.ico for Eiffel classes that will open in the Visual Studio .NET ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/dturfWinFormsDesigner.htmWindows Forms Designer.

Eiffel class file items are located and included automatically into an EiffelEnvision projects, they do not need to be added explicitly. You will only find Eiffel class file items under the ../../../project_items/index.xmlProject Items folder, ../explicit_clusters.xmlExplicit Cluster Folders and ../cluster_folders.xmlCluster Folders. Any changes that occur outside of Visual Studio .NET to the physical file corresponding to the Eiffel class file item, will be updated in your EiffelEnvision project in real time. For more information on the automatic inclusion on Eiffel class file items, see ../cluster_enumeration.xmlAutomatic Enumeration.

heading.content: Opening an Eiffel Class File Item

paragraph.paragraph:
To open an Eiffel class file item in the default editor:
Select the Eiffel class file item you want to open from your EiffelEnvision project.
From the View menu, select Open By default, if the Eiffel class item is represented by the ../../../../../../images/icons/file_class_blue.ico icon the ../../../../../eiffel_editor/index.xmlEiffel Editor (Code View) will open. If the Eiffel class item is represented by the ../../../../../../images/icons/file_class_winform.ico icon then the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/dturfWinFormsDesigner.htmWindows Forms Designer (Design View) will be opened.
You may force an Eiffel class item to open in Design View or Code View by selecting Designer or Code, respectively, from the View menu.
For information on how to add one of the many Eiffel class file item templates to your EiffelEnvision project, see ../../../../configuring/adding_items/index.xmlAdding New and Existing Items.
Eiffel class file item have their own context menu. Below discusses each available option.

Open
Opens the selected Eiffel class file item in the default editor (see above.)

Open With...
Displays the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfOpenWithDialog.htmOpen With dialog box allowing you to select an alternative editor to open the Eiffel class file item with.

View Code
Opens the Eiffel class file item in the ../../../../../eiffel_editor/index.xmlEiffel Editor.

View Designer
Opens the Eiffel class file item in the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/dturfWinFormsDesigner.htmWindows Forms Designer

Include in/Exclude from Project
Depending on the Eiffel class file item's current include/exclude state this menu item will be available. Selecting it will either include or exclude the selected Eiffel class file item from compilation. See ../../../../configuring/item_exclusion.xmlIncluding and Excluding Items for more information.

Delete
Selecting this menu item will remove the Eiffel class file item from the project from disk. See ../../../../configuring/removing_items.xmlRemoving Items for more information.

Rename
Will display an editable box permitting the renaming of the Eiffel class file item on disk and in the project.

Properties
Will display the ../../../../configuring/project_configuration/item_configuration/eiffel_classes.xmlEiffel Class Item Properties.
